buildings.name: VISTA (Science Building)
buildings.notes: New 2024, 22,000 sq ft facility with classrooms and labs, central Hub is 2-story

buildings.name: du Pont Library
buildings.notes: Multi-level with Technology Dept, Digital Arts Lab, Collaborative Learning Center

buildings.name: Clark Memorial Chapel
buildings.notes: Norman-inspired stone chapel with vaulted ceiling - tall single story

buildings.name: Centennial Academics and Art Center
buildings.notes: 14 classrooms, black box theater, sculpture studio, Cole Studio

buildings.name: Main House
buildings.notes: Dining facility with outdoor Class of 1964 Terraces

buildings.name: Strong Field House
buildings.notes: Four indoor tennis courts and wellness studio - high ceiling single story

buildings.name: Corzine Athletic Center/OSU
buildings.notes: Olmsted Student Union, eight squash courts

buildings.name: The Bricks (Dunworth/Pontefract)
buildings.notes: Four ivy-covered buildings, early 1900s Collegiate Georgian style

height_standards.notes: Heights in meters. Athletic facilities have higher ceilings. Chapel has vaulted ceiling.
